name: BEAMA
legal: Company Limited by Guarantee / Trade Association
goal: BEAMA is the trade association for the UK electrotechnical and energy manufacturing industry.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Legislation affecting businesses and manufacturing in the electrical, electronic, engineering and energy industries.
